My pants were a hit! I LOVE the buttons in the front, the pattern went perfect with my jacket & spats. Also I didn’t need a belt because of the adjustable sides which worked out perfect. Light and soft a very good pants.

评论概述: They fit well and they're true to size but they are very thin and the pockets are very shallow.

These are screen quality grade costume pants! Fit perfectly

Material is a bit thin, but for the price they work fine-I was hoping the buttons could be replaced, but they actually are more like a large stud if that makes sense and spin on a metal axis of sorts, sitting out a bit from the fabric (which from a design point keeps them from puckering I guess, but limits options for switching things up).  Just a teeny tiny bit of stretch, a bit long in the leg for the waist size but you can alter them if you are hard core about that-pocket depth not bad, and the belting things on the side work but you can't hide the extra material from what I can tell (you can't insert it so it is hidden in other words, unless there is a way to do this not obvious to me), so if I get picky about that I'll just put a stitch in perhaps? The gold in the product picture does not look very shiny, but it has a nice bit of this in real life! Enjoy...waist 33-34 and medium was FINE.

My husband normally wears size 32 in pants and the medium size worked out well. One thing to know is that these pants do not have a belt loops.  I can see these trousers being part of a pirate, vampire, etc costume. Overall we’re happy with the quality!
The pants are very cool and they look expensive when you put them on but the legs are too baggy. I'm going to get them tailored.

I can fit men's XL. Most clothing I have are XL with a little extra space in the waist.  This was NOT sized in Msn's XL at all.  I could not even button at the waist. I wish they came smaller… alas. They do have pockets! They are comfortable.

Just going to warn you now, if you where a 36x34 or are typically a little longer legged than the average man these will not fit. The waste will fit according to the size but the length is short. Probably about a 32-in inseam.

Hi I have read the reviews but I felt I needed something a little more concrete on the sizing so I’m writing this to hopefully provide some more information.  I purchased xL and I felt I would be returning these however no it was correct.  I’m some where between a 36 and 38 depending the item. These come slightly up higher than the waist.  I’m also typical between a 30 and 32 in the length and these fit more like my 32’s  I hope that give someone a better idea.  There are also some side adjustments. Mine are adjusted at the actual width or the furthest the material will give. So there is still about two or three inches theses can be adjusted down (1 to 1.5 each side)  The pants seem to be well made. They are comfortable. The material has a subtle raised print in the material but blends in so it is a detail that doesn’t steal the show. I bought them because I already have a long black jacket with a very similar print so this will look nice together. The buttons are plastic.

I usually have a hard time fitting costume pants,  I normally wear 36 waist X 32 (or) 34 Inseam.  I am medium build but have thick thighs,  I ordered the "XL" in these.  and good thing I did,  this fit just right any bit less and they would have been snug around my quads.  I may have been able to go a size larger,  but don't want them to look baggy.I am 6ft 2" tall 185lbs,  and ordered XL, and they fit good.  hope this helps.Quality is decent,  detail is real nice.  I am happy with the purchase.

These are really tight, and to be honest I am not small. They are well made and work great, but regardless of sizing they are not for portly fellows. I know how to sew and have a sewing machine. I made them work, but buyer, understand unless you want to do alterations for three nights, these are NOT for bigger men. I made them work, so no beef on the seller/maker. As an aside: If you were like a smaller person, >34" waist, find the size that would fit you and go one up, then you would be good. I bought the largest size and made it work. Square peg in a round hole situation. Most people aren't looking for that. They are not 'light weight' because they are made from thicker cloth, sturdy even. Great for cosplay or Vampire/Goth gatherings, but they don't breathe. I am not saying not to buy them, just know yourself and what you are willing to do to fit them if you are not FIT.
